content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The client’s SDK helps developers build, operate, and scale their games by integrating with the client’s online services across multiple hardware and software platforms. However, the lack of test coverage for the SDK, API Gateway, and back-end services led to integration defects being reported by SDK users, instead of being identified by the client earlier.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All C# SDK interfaces have been covered with integration tests, with\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"test coverage going from 0% to 100% in four defects are
